mapper.select: select distinct r.id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.role_sort, r.data_scope, r.menu_check_strictly, r.dept_check_strictly, r.status, r.del_flag, r.create_time, r.remark from ums_role r left join ums_user_role ur on ur.role_id = r.id left join ums_admin u on u.id = ur.user_id WHERE r.del_flag = '0' and ur.user_id = #{userId}
